summary: Paula Parkins is the teenage daughter of wealthy parents who don't seem to make time for her, so she looks for thrills as the leader of her all girl gang who steal, rob, and rape young men.
cast: Jean Moorhead|Barbara Weeks|Art Millan|Theresa Hancock|Joanne Cangi|Gloria Farr|Glen Corbett|Lee Constant|I. Stanford Jolley|Timothy Farrell|F. Chan McClure|Bruno Metsa|Harry Keaton
director: Director: William Morgan (as Wm. M. Morgan)
title: The Violent Years
